title: 04/02/21 DPS Hour 3 Dick Vitale
itunes:title: 04/02/21 DPS Hour 3 Dick Vitale
description:
Dick Vitale tells Dan that he was late to his very first basketball broadcast. Dick says he was hired to ESPN after a tough loss to Michigan.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
